description: An instance date type that indicates the type of dates given in Date 1 and Date 2

id.description: Unique ID of the instance date type; a UUID

name.description: Name of the instance date type

code.description: Code of the instance date type

displayFormat.description: Describes how to format Date 1 and Date 2

delimiter.description: Delimiter that will be used to format Date 1 and Date 2

keepDelimiter.description: Define if formated date string should keep delimiter if one of dates is not exist

source.description: label indicating where the instance date type entry originates from, i.e. 'folio' or 'local'
